title: Tipo releases Loreto
content:
Typo is proud to announce the release of a new font family "Loreto"

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131019202113im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Loreto-550_6082.png)
author: fontime

comments.content: A part from some inaccuracies in the presentation text;-) a very likable typeface!
